name: Misadventures of Crowley Flatcheeks
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 42 with the theme "Running out of Space". In our game you are running out of planet pieces that are floating away into space while helping other planet inhabitants and trying to complete your adventure.

Team

Leonid Dudakov (@DetectiveLosos) - programming, art, 3d models, vfx, music

AnnieOwl (@owl_annie) - programming, 3d models, writing and story structure, sound design
